availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Hannon (Louisville, Kentucky, master cobbler and policeman)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, master cobbler and policeman. Native of Prussia. Married to Mary Hannon. Father of James Hannon, Solomon Hannon, Margarette Hannon, Amanda Hannon, and Mary Hannon. Master Cobbler in Greenup County, Kentucky, in 1860. Policeman in Louisville, Kentucky.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 764-765.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 12, p. 596A.
KYR-0001-004-3053
